content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name:
      operator:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0198
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when relationship represented in RELREC is not a collected
  relationship
Outcome:
  Message: Relationship represented in RELREC is not a collected relationship
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0198
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Relationships represented in RELREC are collected
                  relationships, either by explicit references or check boxes on the
                  CRF, or by design of the CRF, such as vital signs captured during
                  an exercise stress test.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: '8.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - RELREC

json.Description: Trigger error when relationship represented in RELREC is not a collected relationship

Outcome.Message: Relationship represented in RELREC is not a collected relationship

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Relationships represented in RELREC are collected relationships, either by explicit references or check boxes on the CRF, or by design of the CRF, such as vital signs captured during an exercise stress test.
